title: Slow cooker lamb and spinach curry
ingredients: ['For the curry paste', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 teaspoon ground pepper', '3 spring onions', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '8 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '2 teaspoons cumin', '1 handful spinach leaves', 'For the curry', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '900g boneless leg of lamb, diced', '1 bay leaf', '2 medium tomatoes, roughly chopped', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '2 handfuls spinach leaves']
